text:
@WhiteHouse It’s no secret that there are many reasons why, the current @POTUS  being one.

It is also no secret that the @GOP Governor of Florida is refusing to release vital public information on the mortality of COVID in his state.

Same rule book as China.

https://t.co/MKTU6iO4Kb
